Engineering

QoQ's unparalleled technical expertise is the cornerstone upon which QoQ's entire application modernization strategy is built.

Explore Engineering

QoQ specialize in crafting customized solutions that effortlessly modernize applications to enable continuous innovation.

From meticulously assessing the existing infrastructure to architecting robust modernization strategies, our engineers leverage their expertise to deliver outcomes that exceed expectations. Whether it's migrating to the cloud, refactoring monolithic applications, or implementing microservices architecture, our engineers are equipped with the skills and knowledge needed to navigate complex challenges and drive successful outcomes.

Contact Us

QoQ's Core Engineering Focus

Microservice Design & Build

Our approach involves breaking down complex applications into smaller, independent services, empowering your organization to work with greater flexibility and efficiency. Each microservice focuses on a specific function or feature, enabling autonomous team collaboration and rapid iteration. With simplified maintenance and troubleshooting, as well as seamless scaling and integration capabilities, our microservice solutions help you adapt quickly to changing requirements supporting continuous innovation.

Micro-UI Design and Implementation

In Micro-UI design, QoQ divides interfaces into smaller, more manageable modules, each responsible for a specific part of the functionality. This methodology allows for more flexible design iteration, accelerates development cycles, and simplifies maintenance. QoQ's team creates lightweight and adaptive UI elements that seamlessly integrate into your applications, ensuring a cohesive, clear user experience on any device.

Event Driven Architecture

Event-driven architecture represents a paradigm shift in software development, allowing for real-time responsiveness, scalability, and adaptability. At our core, we believe in harnessing the power of events to drive seamless communication between system components, enabling quick and efficient handling of dynamic data streams. Our team specializes in designing and implementing event-driven solutions tailored to your specific business needs. Whether you're looking to build robust real-time applications, streamline data processing workflows, or enhance system resilience, we're here to guide you every step of the way.

Modern Database Implementation

Evolve the way you manage and leverage your data. Our team of experts combines cutting-edge technologies with industry best practices to architect scalable, high-performance databases tailored to your specific needs. Whether you're looking to migrate to a cloud-native database, implement NoSQL for flexibility and scalability, or optimize your existing database infrastructure, we have the expertise to drive your digital transformation forward. With our modern database implementation services, you can unlock new insights, streamline operations, and propel your organization towards greater success.

Domain Driven Design

Domain-Driven Design (DDD) is not just a methodology, it's a philosophy that revolutionises the way businesses approach software development. By placing the domain at the forefront of the design process, we ensure that our solutions align perfectly with your business needs, driving innovation and delivering tangible value. With DDD, we break down complex business domains into manageable components, or bounded contexts, each with its own well-defined responsibilities and models. This modular approach not only enhances maintainability and scalability but also fosters collaboration between domain experts and developers, resulting in software that truly reflects the intricacies of your organization.

Overcome Common Modernization Challenges

Legacy Insulator

Your current system is the life-blood of your organization. It's untouchable, scary, and old. A more modern outlook is easier said than done, especially when subject matter experts depart. How do you innovate in the face of uncertainty, against a critical path? Where do you even start?

Offering

Outdated Platform

Your platform no longer meets modern requirements, forcing customers to look for competitors. Whether it's an old mainframe or a monolithic system, the challenges of modernization are becoming increasingly evident.

Offering

Documentation Debt

Do you manage to create the necessary diagrams and documentation before product launch? How do you close the technical debt of missing architectural plans? And most importantly, when do you do it?

Offering

Weak Quality & Delays

When quality automation is poor, the entire innovation process suffers: long regression cycles, delayed releases, and constant failures. This slows down development, making regular releases of new features almost impossible.
